info.name: Roblox, cleaned up
info.description:
Blocks ads, removes annoying stuff, and does other things to clean up the Roblox website. uBlock Origin goes great with this userstyle, you should get it if you haven't already!

Like the night? Or just dark stuff? You can use ona2000's Dark Roblox v3.0 userstyle with my style, the two go together very well!

~ Use of this userstyle is recommended with Stylus. A better (and also telemetry-free) userstyles extension. ~
